channel.title: Haven and Hearth
channel.description:
Is there here maybe somebody who plays the game called Haven and Hearth? If yes, post a picture of your place here! If no (and i know NOBODY expect me plays that game), here is where that game is about:
Haven and Hearth is an online game where you have to SURVIVE. First you start in the wilderness (!), and can build up a camp, later a stake claim to own land (1) and more later a village claim for an own village! (one).
Their website: www.havenandhearth.com/portal/
Forum: www.havenandhearth.com/forum/
There is also an video on their website.
Note 1#: Don't think that game sucks because you saw the bad graphics on the website. That video is of a year ago when the game was in world 1 (now it is in world 3 or 4, i think it was 4), now the graphics are 100x so good as on that video.
Note 2# The game is crashed ATM. They are around the 1-2 crashes a day, usually the server restarts 5 minutes after it crashes.
Note 3# There are daily around the 300 users online. That's VERY good for a game that's made by 2 Swedish students and as a hobby.

item.title: Haven and Hearth
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Alright, cool. I thought those were like cheat codes and such but yea, I’ll do it when I get home, since I’m at school right now.

Read full topic

item.title: Haven and Hearth
item.dc:creator: @someone2 someone2
item.description:
@someone2 wrote:

Lin:

This game makes like no sense… I can’t figure out what to do. I stole some stuff in a chest, turned myself into a human, changed my name, then equipped some clothes. Then I climbed this ladder and I can’t do shit but take stuff from trees and rocks.

That’s what you think. Later if you know what to do, you won’t do something else than playing Haven and Hearth. By the way, press that hearth icon, on the left-bottom there is something saying: “Enter you hearth code here”. Enter something there, and post it here, then i can get to you in the game and help you.

Read full topic

@someone2 wrote:

The server is up now. That was just ONE big crash. Usually it gets restarted in 30 minutes, and sometimes even lesser, now it took around the 10 hours…

item.title: Haven and Hearth
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:8, topic:359003”]Those graphics are amazing. I made an account and attempted to play, but as you and the site said, the server is down.

For some reason, I feel as if this is going in the direction of RuneScape. Starts with 2 guys as a hobby, goes online, gets more popular, later becomes an official game, etc… Except the graphics aren’t ugly shit.[/quote]

Read full topic
